title: Secure Login and Multi-Factor Authentication
summary: Implement a secure, multi-step authentication system for safe and verified customer access.
description: Develop a robust authentication framework that incorporates password management, one-time passcodes (OTP), and optional biometric verification to ensure safe user access. Include secure session handling, encryption for data transmission and storage, and automatic timeouts for idle sessions. The solution must comply with industry standards for security and financial data protection while offering a seamless login experience across devices.

title: Responsive User Interface and Personalized Dashboard
summary: Design and develop a responsive interface with dynamic, customer-focused dashboard features.
description: Build a responsive and visually intuitive user interface that adapts fluidly to desktops, tablets, and mobile devices. Create a personalized dashboard that dynamically displays customer accounts, eligible banking products, and tailored recommendations based on profile attributes. Ensure the UI follows best practices for accessibility, usability, and performance optimization while providing a consistent, modern look across all supported devices.

title: Core Banking Integration and Data Management Architecture
summary: Integrate the self-service portal with the bank's core systems and establish an optimized local data infrastructure.
description: Implement secure integration between the self-service portal and the bank’s existing core banking system using APIs and middleware for real-time synchronization. Design a dedicated database to manage local portal data, ensuring reliability, quick response times, and isolation for performance optimization. Include caching mechanisms, queuing, and monitoring services to maintain data integrity, system stability, and scalability for concurrent users.

title: Account Opening and Service Request Workflows
summary: Develop guided digital workflows for account openings and banking service modifications.
description: Create simplified digital workflows that allow customers to open new accounts and submit various service modification requests. Implement features such as automatic form filling, real-time validation, eligibility checks, and digital signatures. Ensure users can save incomplete applications and resume them later. Connect workflows directly with backend systems to minimize manual intervention while ensuring full compliance with KYC and AML guidelines.

title: Document Upload and Management System
summary: Enable secure document upload and management for customer applications and service requests.
description: Develop a secure file upload system that allows customers to submit required documents as part of their workflows. Include validation of accepted file types, virus scanning, and encryption for storage and transfer. Provide version control and integrate document upload status within the user dashboard. Ensure that documents can be linked automatically to service requests and retrieved securely for verification and auditing purposes.

title: Real-Time Status Tracking and Notification Engine
summary: Provide up-to-date visibility and automated alerts for customer-request progress.
description: Implement a module that allows customers to track their requests in real-time through the portal dashboard. Integrate status updates from backend workflows and trigger automated notifications via email or SMS for confirmations, approvals, or required actions. Offer an in-app notification center for consolidated updates and allow customers to configure their preferred communication channels for enhanced transparency and user engagement.

title: Customer Interaction History and Audit Log Management
summary: Maintain a detailed record of all user activities and system interactions for visibility and compliance.
description: Develop an interaction history module to capture and display key events such as logins, transactions, service requests, uploads, and notifications within the portal. Preserve this activity data as an immutable audit trail for regulatory compliance and internal control. Design efficient storage, retrieval, and filtering capabilities for users and administrative auditors to access the information securely and transparently when required.

title: Role-Based Access Control (RBAC) and Authorization Framework
summary: Implement comprehensive role-based access control to manage user permissions and feature visibility.
description: Design and configure a scalable RBAC system that enforces permissions and feature visibility based on the user’s role, profile, and authorization level. Ensure the system prevents unauthorized actions and restricts sensitive financial information from being accessed by unintended users. Integrate this control mechanism with the authentication layer for consistency across the platform while supporting future extensions for new user roles and profiles.

title: Security Framework and Compliance Automation
summary: Implement and monitor data security and regulatory compliance across all platform components.
description: Establish comprehensive data protection through encryption, secure transmission protocols, and real-time threat detection mechanisms. Ensure compliance with international and local regulations such as GDPR, PCI DSS, and ISO 27001. Automate vulnerability scanning, security alerts, and incident response workflows to maintain proactive defense mechanisms. Provide detailed compliance reports and maintain an auditable record of all relevant activities.
